articles.title: GTA Online Street Drug Dealers' locations (February 18, 2023) - Sportskeeda
articles.description: GTA Online's latest weekly update added many new features to the game, including the Street Dealers of Los Santos. These NPCs can be found daily at three random locations on the title's map.
